cheatsheet.title: Creating MO relationships inside a single MOM

intro.description: This tutorial guides you through creating an association between two distinct MOCs in a single MOM.

item.title: Select parent class
item.description: Right-click on the parent EcimMoClass or EcimRootMoClass in the Project Explorer. The parent is the owner of the relationship.

item.title: Select EcimContainment [Parent-End]
item.description: From the context menu select MetaModelAgent > Add > EcimContainment [Parent-End].

item.title: Fill in required fields
item.description: Enter appropriate values in the boxes.

item.title: Fill in required fields/Select child end type
item.description: Enter appropriate values in the boxes. Tick EcimContainment [Child-End] in the Select kind of opposite association end section.

item.title: Fill in required fields
item.description: Enter appropriate values in the boxes.

item.title: Select Finish
item.description: The EcimContainment construct is now completed.
